title: Twisted AAA Trilayer MoTe2 Photoluminescence Spectroscopy
description: Characterization of a twisted AAA trilayer MoTe2 sample using scanning photoluminescence (PL) spectroscopy at 5.8K. The study includes gate-dependent measurements, analysis of K-valley excitons and trions, and investigation of hysteresis effects possibly related to ferroelectricity. Different spots on the sample are probed to assess uniformity and local properties.
